text: [Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
hi I'm zubair A Cloud support engineer
here at the AWS office in Cape Town
today I will show you how to change your
light sale plan let's get started as you
can see I've logged into the AWS
Management console now let's navigate to
the light sale console
in the light cell console select the
instance whose plan you would like to
upgrade
to upgrade your light cell instance plan
follow these steps under the snapshots
tab select create snapshot to create a
backup of the instance enter a name for
your snapshot and then select create
when the newly created snapshot is
visible in the console choose the right
arrow to expand it then from the
Ellipsis icon choose create new instance
confirm the region where you want to
launch the instance and then add the
launch script optional and change the
SSH keypad required
now under choose a new instance plan
select the required instance plan based
on your use case also under the identify
your instance enter an alternate name to
your new instance
then select create instance
to downgrade your light cell plan back
up your light cell instance to the
Amazon simple storage service or Amazon
elastic Block store service
then launch a new smaller light sale
plan and migrate the data from the old
instance by following these steps
I've used S3 as my backup option for the
light cell instance I've configured an
AWS identity and access management user
for my lateral instance and then I've
granted the required access to perform
the S3 operations log into the instance
that you want to downgrade then backup
your data to a Tor file by following
these steps change to the directory that
you want to save as your backup
create a compressed top file with the
directory containing your application
data with these options
to upload the data from the light cell
instance to S3 use these commands create
an S3 bucket
copy your light cell data to S3
verify your files in the S3 bucket
Now navigate to the light cell console
page and select create instance
select the platform that you want under
select a platform and then select a
blueprint that you want
then add a launch script and change SSH
key pair if required select the smaller
instance plan enter a name under the
identify your instance and select create
instance
when the page updates find the newly
created instance wait a few minutes and
then try to connect to it
after you log into the smaller instance
install and configure the AWS command
line interface then download the light
cell backup data from the S3 bucket
using these commands
list and download your data from your S3
bucket
uncompress the top backup file with the
application data files to your
application data directory
and that's it now you have a smaller
light cell instance plan with all your
data and now you know how to change your
Amazon light cell plan
thank you for watching and happy cloud
computing from all of us here at AWS
[Applause]
[Music]
[Music]
